content: scrump is the toy that lilo from lilo & stitch made herself my favourite thing about this toy is that it doesn t need to be perfect because it s supposed to be a little raggedy i was trying to bust my stash so i don t really remember what the yarns i ve used in this pattern are called but i believe brava worsted from knitpicks is close **materials needed to create a 8 in tall toy ** -turquoise blue pink yellow baby blue royal blue and black yarn worsted weight -black red yellow embroidery thread you can also just use yarn in those colours but the details won t be as accurate and fine -3 5mm crochet hook -polyfill or cotton for stuffing -scissors -darning needle -stitch marker -pins **the terminology used in this pattern are as follows ** st s stitch es chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase two single crochets in one stitch decrease invisible decrease single_crochet two stitches together through the front loops only slip_stitch slip_stitch flo crochet only in the front loops loop closest to you of each stitch … x # repeat anything in the parenthesis however many times the number indicates # total number of stitches for that row number single_crochet one single_crochet in the following # stitches number h double_crochet one half_double_crochet or double_crochet in the follow # of stitches decrease single_crochet 2 stitches together
